00019 EncodeDialog::EncodeDialog(QWidget* parent)
00020     : OptionDialog(parent)
00021 {
00022     this->setObjectName("EncodeDialog");
00023     m_logger->setClassName("EncodeDialog");
00024 
00025     this->setWindowTitle("Encode message");
00026     this->setWindowIcon(QPixmap(QString::fromUtf8(":/icons/img/encode.png")));
00027 
00028     okButton->setText("Encode");
00029     iconLabel->setPixmap(QPixmap(QString::fromUtf8(":/icons/img/encode.png")));
00030     msgLabel->setText("Message to hide in the picture");
00031 }

00033 void EncodeDialog::showEvent(QShowEvent* event)
00034 {
00035     if(!event->spontaneous())
00036     {
00037         destinationLineEdit->setText(Controller::config.get("output"));
00038         msgTextEdit->setText("");
00039         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setText("");
00040         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setText("");
00041         checkCryptoPassword();
00042         imageFormatChanged(imageFormatComboBox->currentText());
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 QWidget* EncodeDialog::currentFormatWidget(FormatModuleInterface* module)
00047 {
00048     if (module == NULL)
00049         return NULL;
00050 
00051     return module->encodeWidget();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void EncodeDialog::ok()
00055 {
00056     if(!isDialogReady())
00057         return;
00058 
00059     /*
00060         * CHECK that the encode widgets are ready
00061         */
00062     if(msgTextEdit->toPlainText().length()==0)
00063     {
00064         QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Warning"),
00065                               "You must give a message to hide into the image.");
00066         return;
00067     }
00068 
00069     QString output = destinationLineEdit->text();
00070     if(!QFile::exists(output))
00071     {
00072         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00073                              "The folder where the image is going to be save doesn't exists : operation canceled !");
00074         return;
00075     }
00076 
00077     // NOW PROCESS BEGIN
00078 
00079     setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00080 
00081     if(!currentFormatModule()->isEncodeWidgetReady())
00082     {
00083         setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00084         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00085                              QString("Wrong options for the current encoding format.\n")+
00086                              "Please check your options values before lauching the encoding process.");
00087         return;
00088     }
00089 
00090     if( QFile::exists(output+"/"+m_img->shortName()) )
00091     {
00092         setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00093         QMessageBox msgBox;
00094         msgBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
00095         msgBox.setText("The destination file already exists !");
00096         msgBox.setDetailedText(output+"/"+m_img->shortName());
00097         msgBox.setInformativeText("Do you really want to override it ?");
00098         msgBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok | QMessageBox::Cancel);
00099         msgBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Cancel);
00100         if(msgBox.exec()==QMessageBox::Cancel)
00101             return;
00102     }
00103 
00104     EncodedData data(msgTextEdit->toPlainText(), currentCharset());
00105     if(cryptoCheckBox->checkState()!=Qt::Unchecked)
00106     {
00107         CryptoModuleInterface* module = currentCryptoModule();
00108         if(module!=NULL)
00109         {
00110             try{
00111                 data = module->encode(cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text(), data);
00112             }catch(ModuleException e){
00113                 displayModuleException(module->name(), e);
00114             }
00115         }
00116         else
00117             m_logger->warning("Invalid encryption type");
00118     }
00119 
00120     m_img = currentFormatModule()->encodeImage(m_img);
00121     m_img->setData( data );
00122 
00123     QString errorMsg;
00124     if(!m_img->compile())
00125         errorMsg += "- An error occured during the encoding process.\n";
00126     else if( m_img->save(output) )
00127     {
00128         setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00129         emit encodedImage(m_img->filePath());
00130         this->accept();
00131     }
00132     else
00133         errorMsg += "- Cannot save the output file : "+m_img->filePath()+".\n";
00134 
00135     if(errorMsg.length() > 0)
00136         QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Error"), errorMsg);
00137 
00138     setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00139 }
